entry.title: Why RUM Is an Extension?
entry.content:
RUM is an index access method provided as an extension for PostgreSQL 9.6+. Major difference between RUM and GIN is that RUM allows to do ranking inside index scan rather than caculate ranks from heap. Thus, RUM allows to accelerate fulltext search queries in times in comparison to GIN.
